invocations.description: Returns true if the 'trade window' is open, false otherwise.
invocations.ex:
if not $tradeopen then
	say('hi') wait(1700, 2300)
	npcsay('trade') wait(500, 1000)
end
invocations.exDescription: Used as an action waypoint. Will check if the trade window is open. If it's not, say: 'hi', wait some time for the NPC channel to be open, then say 'trade'.
